item.title: 30DaysOfQGIS â€“ Master QGIS in 30 Days
item.description: Day 1 Introduction and Course Overview From the great spatialthoughts.com, I mean the Ujaval Gandhi and team, this challenge is a really way to improve skills in geoprocessing. I am a quite rusty, so Why not to practice? The goal is to achieve the 30 challenges, maybe I will be late a little bit! Anyway, Lets go! The Advanced QGIS (Full Course Material) is here. The Youtube content is Here

item.title: How to upload TCX file from Polar Flow to Garmin Connect
item.description: Introduction I used a Garmin 310XT since 2015 and it works very well until now. However I would like to measure some data from my sleep time. Thus I was wondering to buy a new watch. My first idea was a Garmin, but the prices in Brazil were a little bit bitter that moment. I made a research and found out some Polar models, and after all I bought a Polar M2.
